item.title: Jalagari Ashok from Aiza Appointed as State Secretary of Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a significant development for the Mudiraj community, Jalagari Ashok, a lawyer hailing from Aiza town in Jogulamba Gadwal district, has been appointed as the State Secretary of the Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha. The official appointment was made during a meeting held at the Mahasabha’s State Office, where State President Dr. Chappari Shankara Mudiraj personally handed over the appointment letter.
Expressing his gratitude, Ashok thanked the State President and all the committee members for en...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Congress Workers Warn of Protest March from Gadwal to Gandhi Bhavan Over Neglect of BC Leadership
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a strongly-worded declaration of discontent, senior Congress leaders and grassroots workers from Gadwal expressed their anger over the party’s alleged neglect of BC (Backward Class) leadership and loyal cadre. At an extended Congress party workers’ meeting held at Brindavan Gardens in Gadwal, former Municipal Chairman B.S. Keshav and former Vice Chairman, TPCC member Ganjipet Shankar, led the chorus of voices demanding recognition and justice from the party high command.
Allegations ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: KT Rama Rao’s ‘Gift a Smile’ initiative helps MBBS student from Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[KT Rama Rao’s ‘Gift a Smile’ initiative helps MBBS student from Jogulamba Gadwal
Sushmita, an MBBS student at Osmania Medical College, had appealed to Rama Rao on social media, seeking help to pursue her education
By Telangana Today Published Date - 21 July 2025, 07:52 PM
Hyderabad: BRS working president KT Rama Rao’s birthday initiative, Gift a Smile, has come to the aid of an MBBS student struggling to continue her education due to financial hardship.
Inspired by the gesture, a doctor coup...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
